label: Export directory
help: Path where your sets will be created (original sets will be left untouched)

label: Select
help: Select export folder

label: FbNeo set folder
help: Path to your fbneo set, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Mame2010 set folder
help: Path to your mame2010 set, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Mame2003 set folder
help: Path to your mame2003 set, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Mame2003Plus set folder
help: Path to your mame2003plus set, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Select
help: Select set folder

label: Images folder
help: Paths to your images set, leave empty if you do not have it

label: Select
help: Select your images folder

label: Image filename format
help: Format of the image filename

label: Dry run
help: Check this to generate only dat and CSV files, no roms will be copied

label: Keep level
help: Select minimum working level at which roms will be kept

label: Keep not tested roms
help: Check to keep untested roms even in STRICT mode

label: Exclusion Type
help: Determine how roms are kept if they are in different sets#nSTRICT (only keep the best working one), EQUAL (keep in several sets if equals in both), NONE (keep in all sets)

label: Prefered set
help: General prefered set in STRICT mode if rom is in same working level in several sets

label: Use prefered set for genre
help: Check to use prefered set for genres in STRICT mode and define them. Takes precedence over general prefered set if activated

label: BeatEmUp prefered set
help: Prefered set for BeatEmUp games

label: Gun prefered set
help: Prefered set for Gun games

label: Misc prefered set
help: Prefered set for Misc games

label: Platform prefered set
help: Prefered set for Platform games

label: Puzzle prefered set
help: Prefered set for Puzzle games

label: Race prefered set
help: Prefered set for Race games

label: RunNGun prefered set
help: Prefered set for RunNGun games

label: Shmup prefered set
help: Prefered set for Shmup games

label: Sport prefered set
help: Prefered set for Sport games

label: VsFighting prefered set
help: Prefered set for VsFighting games

label: Use genre subfolders
help: Check to use genre subfolders for roms

label: Scrape images
help: Check to use images for games and folders

label: Verify
help: Check that your paths are okay

label: Save
help: Save your configuration to file

label: Proceed
help: Create your romsets

label: Confirm
help: Your output dir is {outputDir}#nIts content will be erased.#nIf you don't want to proceed, close this window, or click Cancel
